name: linkvault
description: A modern link management application with folder organization

scripts.start: npm run build && cd dist && python -m http.server 8000 --bind 127.0.0.1
scripts.build: npm run build-css && npm run copy-files
scripts.copy-files: copy src\*.html dist\ && if not exist dist\js mkdir dist\js && xcopy /E /Y src\js dist\js\
